Meanings: good, also refer to as : gd
Gas & Oil, also write as : G/O or G&O
گاز و نفتی که گل حفاری را از حالت یکپارچه در می‌آورد
Gas & Oil, also write as : G & O or G&O
A small section of pipe in the top of a tank through which a tank may be gaged
GR+N, Gamma Ray & Neutron running with each other
لاگ پرتوی گاما که میزان رادیواکتیویته سازند را آشکار می‌سازد
سوند کمکی اندازه گیرنده پرتوی گاما
GR+N, Gamma Ray & Neutron running with each other

A compressible fluid that fills any container in which it is confined. Technically, a gas will not condense when it is compressed and cooled, because a gas can exist only above the critical temperature for its particular composition. Below the critical temperature, this form of matter is known as a vapor, because liquid can exist and condensation can occur. Sometimes the terms "gas" and"vapor" are used interchangeably. The latter, however, should be used for those streams in which condensation can occur and that originate form, or are in equilibrium with, a liquid phase
G/O, also refer to as : G&O
گاز و نفتی که گل حفاری را از حالت یکپارچه در می‌آورد
A tubular, perforated device attached to the bottom of sucker

rod pump that helps to prevent gas lock. The device works on the principle that gas, being lighter than oil, rises. As well fluids enter the anchor, the gas breaks out of the fluid and exits from the anchor through perforations near the top. The remaining fluids enter the pump through a mosquito bill a tube with the anchor , which has an opening near the bottom. In this way, all or most of the gas escapes before the fluids enter the pump
gas phase overlying an oil zone and occurring within the same producing Formation as the Oil
گل حفاری که با گاز آغشته شده است

GCM, or A drilling Mud that contains entrained formation gas, giving the mud a characteristically fluffy texture. Then entrained gas in not released before the fluid returns to the well, the weight or density of the fluid column is reduced. Because a large amount of gas in mud lowers its density, gas
cut mud must be treated to
reduce the chance of a Kick
گازی که گل حفاری را آغشته نموده باشد و آنرا از حالت یکپارچه در آورد باشد
A Well into which gas in injected for the purpose of maintaining or supplementing pressure in an oil reservoir. More commonly called : a gas injection Well
The process of raising or lifting fluid from a well by injecting gas down the well through tubing or through the tubing

casing annulus. Injected gas aerates the fluid to make it exert less pressure than the formation does; consequently, the higher formation pressure forces the fluid out of the wellbore. Gas may be injected continuously or intermittently, depending on the producing characteristics of the well and the arrangement of the gas

A condition sometimes encountered in a pumping well when dissolved gas, released from solution during the upstroke of the plunger, appears as free gas between the valves. If the gas pressure is sufficient, the standing valve is locked shut, and no fluid enter the tubing
. A device fitted to the gauging hatch on a pressure tank that enables manual dipping and sampling without loss of vapor
بوی گاز که از نمونه‌ها به مشام می‌رسد
A stratum of sand or porous sandstone from which natural gas is obtained
A Well that primarily produces gas. Legal definitions vary among the states
Any material i.e. Paper, Cork, Asbestos, or Rubber used to seal two essentially stationary surfaces
The contact between Gas and Oil
GOR, A measure of the volume of gas produced with oil, expressed in cubic feet per barrel of cubic meters per tonne
Gge, also refer to as : ggd
وسیله ای که استاندارد بودن اندازه چیزی را می‌سنجد
wall casing section of the string, usually located just below the preventers or tree
A cylindrical metal ring used to guide, and centralize, packers or tools inside casing
Running of a gauge on tubing or slickline to verify casing dimensions
گازی که گل حفاری را از حالت یکپارچه در می‌آورد
GAMMA COMPENSATED DENSITY/GAMMA GAMMA, Log Curve name
گازی که گل حفاری را آغشته نموده و آنرا از حالت یکپارچه در می‌آورد
GAMMA COLLAR PERFORATING RECORD, Log Curve name
good, also refer to as : g
geode, also sometimes use for good

Words.EnglishWord: geode  also sometimes use for good

Meanings: A scientist who gathers and interprets data pertaining to the rocks of the earth's crust
GAMMA GAMMA DENSITY, Log Curve name
gauged, also refer to as : Gge
وسیله ای که استاندارد بودن اندازه چیزی را می‌سنجد
GAMMA GUARD EL, Log Curve name
A truck equipped with a pair of poles, and hoisting equipment for use in lifting heavy machinery around a lease
A truck equipped with a pair of poles, and hoisting equipment for use in lifting heavy machinery around a lease
One of the horizontal braces between the legs of a derrick
One of the horizontal braces between the legs of a derrick
A device used to form a seal around a reciprocating or rotating rod as in a pump to prevent fluid leakage. Specifically, the movable part of a stuffing box by which the packing is compressed
A Sub with a glass blockage in the bore, used to isolate a surge chamber in gravel packing or perforation cleaning operations
رس چسبنده و با رنگ خاکستری مایل به آبی
لایه چسبنده زیر سطح زمین که توسط رنگ پریده و کمبود اکسید آهن آن مشخص می‌شود
GEOCHEMICAL LOGGING TOOL, Log Curve name
بوی گاز که از نمونه‌ها به مشام می‌رسد
To lower the Drill Stem, Tubing, Casing, or Sucker Rods in to the Well
A device that is inserted into a pipeline for the purpose of cleaning; a line scraper. Also called a pig
. A device that is lowered into the borehole of a well for various purposes such as enclosing surveying instruments, detonating instruments, and the like
Describes a well in which water production is increasing
Rock with good porosity more than 12 % , e.g. II
The curved connection between the Rotary Hose and the Swivel
اتصال خمیده بین خرطومی کلی و هرز گرد
نمودار پرتوی گاما که توسط رادیواکتیویته کار می‌کند
سوند یا ابزار کمکی اندازه گیرنده پرتوی گاما
A rock with very much grains, more compact than Packstone , grain size larger than 20 μ without calcareous Mud , also called : Calcirudite or Rudstone, Dunham Classification for Carbonate rocks
Just grains, without calc Mud, grains > 20 μ, also called Calcirudite or Rudstone
سنگی که کلا از دانه تشکیل شده و فاقد گل آهکی می‌باشد و بهنگام رسوبگذاری قطعات آن بیکدیگر متصل نبوده اند
سنگی است که صرفا دارای دانه بوده و دانه‌های آن بزرگتر از 20 میکرون و فاقد گل آهکی است. نام‌های دیگر آن: کلسی رودایت و رود استون می‌باشد
ذرات یا دانه هایی با اندازه بین 2 تا 4 میلیمتر
A mechanism that is fitted into an overshot to grasp and retrieve fish from the Borehole. The interior of a Grapple is wickered to engage the Fish
A hoe or other kind of weed cutter
A mass of very fine gravel placed around a slotted Liner in a Well
A method of well completion in which a slotted or perforated liner, often wire

wrapped, is placed in the well and surrounded by gravel. If open hole, the well is sometimes enlarged by underreaming at the point where the gravel is packed. The mass of gravel excludes sand from the wellbore but allows continued production
A Packer used for the Well completion method of gravel packing
To place a slotted or perforated liner in a Well and surround it with gravel

The specific gravity or density of Oil expressed in terms of a scale devised by the American Petroleum Institute. The lighter the oil, the greater the gravity; other factors being equal, the higher the API gravity, the better price the oil will bring, API

Density expressed as the ratio of the weight of a volume of substance to the weight of an equal volume of another standard substance. In the case of liquids and solids, the standard is water. In the case of natural gas or other gas materials, the standard is air
gy, also rarely write as : gry
سنگی است که دارای دانه بیش از 10 درصد بوده و دارای گل فراوان با اندازه کوچکتر از 20 میکرون می‌باشد. اجزاء این سنگ در هنگام رسوبگذاری به هم متصل نمی‌باشند
gn, also sometimes write as : grn
gy, also write as : gr, but recently usually use : gy
Sometimes and rarely write as : green, but mostly use "gn" for green
The total production of oil from a Well or lease during a specified period of time
A cable which fix the Rig on the surface
مهار زمینی دکل حفاری که دکل را در جای خود مهار می‌نماید
ارتفاع سطح زمین از سطح دریا که دکل حفاری بر روی آن قرار دارد
اختصاری است که گاهی برای رنگ خاکستری بکار برده می‌شود
HYDROCARBON OR GAS DETECTION, Log Curve name
A cylindrical metal ring used to guide packers past casing obtrusions

A short, heavy, cylindrical section of steel filled with concrete and rounded at the bottom, which is placed at the end of the casing string. It prevents the casing from snagging on irregularities in the borehole as it is lowered. A passage through the center of the shoe allow drilling fluid to pass up into the casing while it is being lowered and allows cement to pass out during cementing operations. Also called casing shoe
. A device, similar to a Casing Shoe, placed at the end of other tubular goods
Any relatively sticky Formation, such as Clay encountered in drilling
A slang term to denote a mixture of diesel oil and bentonite
To create holes in Casing and Cement set through a productive formation. A common method of completing a well is to set casing through the oil
bearing formation and cement it. A perforating Gun is then lowered into the hole and fired to detonate high

powered jets or shoot steel projectiles bullets through the casing and cement and into the pay zone. The formation fluids flow out of the reservoir through the perforations and into the wellbore. See also : Perforating Gun

A Well which is uncontrolable, or An Oilwell that has come in with such great pressure that the Oil jets out of the Well like a Geyser. In reality, a Gusher is a blowout and is extremely wasteful of reservoir fluids and drive energy. In the early days of the Oil industry, Gushers were common and many times were the only indication that a large reservoir of Oil and Gas had been struck
A cable which fix the Rig on the surface, or A Wireline attached to a mast, derrick, or offshore platform to stabilize it. See wind guy line
یک کابل یا خط سیمی که جهت حفظ پایداری به دکل متصل می‌گردد
A buried weight or anchor to which a guy line is attached. See also : Deadman
A rope or cable used to steady a mast or pole
gyp, A naturally occurring crystalline form of Calcium Sulfate in which each molecule of Calcium Sulfate is combined with two molecules of water
سنگی است که دارای دانه بیش از 10 درصد بوده و دارای گل فراوان با اندازه کوچکتر از 20 میکرون می‌باشد. اجزاء این سنگ در هنگام رسوبگذاری به هم متصل نمی‌باشند
